changes.description: Defaults to `true` (was previously `false`), requiring explicit index names for destructive operations.
changes.impact: Wildcard patterns for delete/close operations now fail unless this setting is overridden.

changes.description: Cannot be set on nodes without the `data_frozen` role.
changes.impact: .remove setting on non‑frozen nodes to avoid startup errors.

changes.description: Deprecated and ignored—Elasticsearch now dynamically determines clause limits.
changes.impact: Remove this setting; large clause queries may now require better memory/thread‑pool tuning.

changes.description: Minimum value is now 1s. Any lower value causes startup error.
changes.impact: Ensure poll interval ≥ 1s.

changes.description: File and native realms are enabled by default now; explicitly disabling them requires setting `enabled: false`.
changes.impact: Update realm configs accordingly.

changes.description: The `order` setting is now required for each configured realm; must be unique.
changes.impact: Cluster fails to start without this value.

changes.description: All `discovery.zen` settings removed.
changes.impact: Remove legacy discovery settings to avoid boot errors.

changes.description: Removed in 8.0; configuration now invalid.
changes.impact: Remove it from elasticsearch.yml.

changes.description: Removed in favor of `http.tcp.no_delay`.
changes.impact: Replace setting accordingly.

changes.description: Removed; use `transport.connect_timeout` instead.
changes.impact: Remove old setting.

changes.description: Removed; nodes must use separate data paths.
changes.impact: Remove setting to avoid errors.

changes.description: Removed remote cluster discovery settings.
changes.impact: Use `node.remote_cluster_client` instead.

changes.description: Removed in favor of `node.pidfile`.
changes.impact: Rename setting accordingly.

changes.description: Replaced by `node.processors`. Value may no longer exceed CPU count.
changes.impact: Update config and ensure not oversized.

changes.description: Removed; filters now always required.
changes.impact: Remove setting to avoid errors.

changes.description: Tier-based allocation settings removed. Use `index.routing.allocation.include._tier_preference`.
changes.impact: Disable obsolete tier settings.

changes.setting: shared data path / per index data path
changes.description: Deprecated; only existing 7.x indices can use shared data paths.
changes.impact: Avoid using deprecated data path config.

changes.description: Now only accepts `true`. `false` is illegal.
changes.impact: Ensure setting is either removed or set to `true`.

changes.description: Removed. Use dangling indices APIs instead.
changes.impact: Remove setting.

changes.description: Removed (Transport client deprecated).
changes.impact: Clean up thread pool config.

changes.description: Removed in 8.0.
changes.impact: No direct action needed; defaults apply.

changes.description: A batch of transport.tcp.* settings have been renamed (e.g. `transport.tcp.port` → `transport.port`).
changes.impact: Rename any legacy `transport.tcp` settings.

changes.description: Enabled by default as `indexing_data`, compression scheme changed to LZ4.
changes.impact: Monitor CPU/memory for compression impacts.

changes.description: Indices created in Elasticsearch 6.x or earlier are unsupported.
changes.impact: Reindex old indices to 7.x before migrating.

changes.description: Cannot read closed pre‑7.x indices.
changes.impact: Reindex if needed before upgrading.

changes.description: Max completion contexts per field limited to 10.
changes.impact: Redesign any usage exceeding 10.

changes.description: Support for SysV init removed.
changes.impact: Use systemd or other modern init system.

changes.description: Java 17+ now mandatory.
changes.impact: Upgrade JVM to Java 17 or later.

changes.description: No FIPS-certified Java 17 available yet.
changes.impact: Stay on 7.x or request exception until FIPS support.

changes.description: JAVA_HOME no longer supported; use bundled JDK or `ES_JAVA_HOME`.
changes.impact: Update deployment environment.

changes.description: The `fields` parameter now normalizes `geo_shape` objects that cross the international dateline (e.g. splits a polygon into two).
changes.impact: If your application requires original (unnormalized) geometries, retrieve them from `_source` instead.

changes.details: Legacy values other than `single-node` or `multi-node` are deprecated and will be forbidden in a future version.
changes.impact: Avoid using non-standard values; better to omit this setting to rely on default discovery behavior.

changes.details: Elasticsearch used to silently ignore invalid or malformed bulk action lines. That leniency is deprecated and future versions will reject such bulk requests.
changes.impact: Ensure bulk actions are well‑formed JSON objects with a recognized action key.

changes.details: The `index_include_frozen` parameter and the `FROZEN` syntax are deprecated following frozen index deprecation.
changes.impact: Use data tiers instead—unfreeze indices using the unfreeze index API and avoid frozen-specific SQL syntax.

changes.details: Configuring a bind DN in an LDAP or Active Directory realm without a corresponding bind password is deprecated.
changes.impact: In a future major release, nodes will fail to start if a bind_dn is specified without a bind_password.

changes.description: The `_knn_search` endpoint is deprecated; use the `knn` option inside the standard search API.
changes.impact: Applications should switch from `_knn_search` to uses the `knn` parameter in the search API.

changes.description: Starting in 8.5, the bulk API rejects requests containing unrecognized action types (e.g. not `create`, `update`, `index`, or `delete`). Prior versions silently ignored them.
changes.impact: Applications must only send valid action types; malformed bulk requests now return 400 Bad Request.

changes.details: Plugins extending the NetworkPlugin interface are deprecated and won't install in the next major release.
changes.impact: Remove or update any custom plugins relying on NetworkPlugin.

changes.details: Overriding join validators or election strategies via DiscoveryPlugin is deprecated.
changes.impact: Stop using custom discovery plugins that override these behaviors.

changes.details: The default `remove_binary` option for the ingest attachment processor will change from `false` to `true` in a future release.
changes.impact: Explicitly set `remove_binary` to either `true` or `false` to avoid future behavior change.

changes.details: Values less than `1` are now ignored and will be forbidden in a future version.
changes.impact: Ensure this setting is at least `1`.

changes.details: Parameters like `type`, `fields`, `copy_to`, and `boost` in metadata field mappings are silently ignored and will cause deprecation warnings.
changes.impact: Remove these parameters from metadata field definitions in mappings.

changes.details: The `state` field is deprecated in the reroute API response.
changes.impact: Use the `explain` parameter instead for result introspection.

changes.name: JsonProcessor strict parsing
changes.description: The ingest node’s `json` processor now rejects invalid JSON by default instead of silently dropping trailing invalid content.
changes.impact: Applications must send valid JSON or configure `strict_json_parsing: false` on the `json` processor to preserve previous lenient behavior.

changes.details: The `cluster.routing.allocation.type` setting is deprecated and will be removed in a future version.
changes.impact: Discontinue use of this setting.

changes.name: TDigestState default changed
changes.description: Percentile aggregations now use the `HybridDigest` implementation by default for TDigest, offering faster performance but with a small accuracy trade‑off.
changes.impact: Percentile results may slightly differ. To retain previous exact behavior, set `execution_hint: high_accuracy` per agg, or set `search.aggs.tdigest_execution_hint` to `high_accuracy` cluster‑wide.

changes.description: The `vectortile` thread pool has been removed; any configuration such as `thread_pool.vectortile.size` will cause Elasticsearch to fail startup.
changes.impact: Remove any `vectortile` thread pool settings from `elasticsearch.yml`.

changes.change: Pre-configured analyzer components updated to use `IndexVersion` type
changes.description: Analysis components now accept `IndexVersion` instead of `Version`, as IndexVersion is decoupled from node version starting in 8.10.
changes.impact: Upgrade or recompile custom Java plugins or client integrations referencing analyzer APIs.

changes.details: The `apm_user` built-in role has been deprecated and will be removed in a future major release.
changes.impact: Users should migrate to the `editor` or `viewer` roles instead.

changes.details: The `transport_versions` subobject of the response to `GET _cluster/state` has been replaced by the `nodes_versions` subobject.
changes.impact: If needed, retrieve the per-node transport versions from the `nodes_versions` subobject.

deprecations.title: Rollup functionality is now deprecated
deprecations.details: Rollup functionality has been deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Previously, rollups were available in technical preview.
deprecations.impact: Use downsampling to reduce storage costs for time series data by storing it at reduced granularity.
